data.description: The beginner division is intended for underclassmen students who do not have much experience with CTFs, cybersecurity, or even computer science! We require teams with experience to compete in the Advanced division instead.
data.name: Beginner

data.description: If either you or your teammate have taken CS 341, ECE 391, CS 461, or an equivalent systems programming course, are graduate students, or played in three or more CTFs.
data.name: Advanced
